quest_log.name: Escort Supplies to Phandalin
quest_log.description: Gundren Rockseeker hired us to escort a wagon of supplies to Phandalin. Payment: 10gp each upon delivery.
quest_log.notes: Gundren left ahead of us with a warrior named Sildar Hallwinter

quest_log.name: Rescue Gundren Rockseeker
quest_log.description: Gundren's horses were found dead on the Triboar Trail, ambushed by goblins. The wagon was dragged east into the Neverwinter Wood. We must find where they took him.
quest_log.notes: Found and infiltrated goblin hideout. Killed all goblins in first chamber and eastern passage. Found Gundren Rockseeker and Sildar Hallwinter in prison chamber - both alive but unconscious and bound. Need to free them and escape.

notes: Party hired in Neverwinter 3 days ago
Gundren seemed excited about something he and his brothers discovered
He mentioned 'Wave Echo Cave' but wouldn't give details
Long rest taken at ambush site. Successfully infiltrated goblin hideout at night.
Killed goblin lookout and guard at hideout entrance
Defeated all goblins in first chamber and eastern passage. Found Gundren Rockseeker and Sildar Hallwinter in prison chamber - both alive but unconscious and bound.
